entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Chetwynd
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:12 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -22.4°C

Visibility: 56.3 km

Dewpoint: -28.1°C

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this morning. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:28 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of light snow beginning overnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 08:28 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:28 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023
